name: Bears
description:
Strategic Bear Wizards. Play against your friends, or a simple AI, in this work-in-progress strategy game.

Press F to interact in the menu (or just use your mouse).

All assets, gameplay, and everything else are work in progress. No Audio yet. 

follow me @BaldSavant on twitter for future updates! (next goals: complete menus, more abilities, polished core gameplay loop)
